Kinetic Typography

Video

The Process

The animation was designed in Adobe After Effects. The core concept was to have the words themselves animate in a way that reflected their meaning. The timing was synchronized to a custom-composed electronic music track. The final render was color-graded in DaVinci Resolve to match the event's branding.

Objective

To create a high-energy opening sequence that introduces the conference themes.

Client

Tech Conference Opener

Tools Used

  • Adobe After Effects
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • DaVinci Resolve
